univers.infoH0: Current expansion rate of the universe (Hubble constant)
univers.infoTypeUnivers: You can choose the type of universe. If you choose classical, you can modify the omegas. Otherwise, one of the four omegas will be equal to 1, the others to 0
univers.infoOmégaR0: Current radiation density parameter. It is calculated as output, but you can choose to set it to zero with "Nothing" and choose whether to consider "Primordial Neutrinos"
univers.infoOmégaK0: Current curvature density parameter. You can set it to 0, which corresponds to a flat universe
univers.infoAmin: The plot will not go below this value. Cannot be greater than 1 if the universe has no beginning.
univers.infoAmax: The plot will not go above this value. Cannot be less than 1 if the universe has no beginning.
univers.avertissement: This site allows for simulations considering 11 parameters. There may be calculation errors or, in the worst case, a crash of the web page. In such cases, please reload the page
univers.infoNomFichier: File name for saving the plot. Do not use special characters such as . * / | + \ and others

constante.typeAnnée: You can choose the type of year, which changes the number of days per year
constante.alerteConstante: Unable to find the parent window
